name: Boardeerlands
description:
Boardeerlands is an escape-puzzle game. The player character, the boardeer, has to solve a series of puzzles to escape from a mysterious series of rooms. Tear down the borders to progress through the map.

If stuck with crossing the water, try restarting and maybe pulling the handle that is sometimes stuck in the wal before doing the cubes.

ALT + ENTER for Fullscreen!
